title: A Shift in the Earth
description: Farren should have died. Instead, she lost everything.As the only female to ever lead, she feels the pressure every day. To be more. A demented group of witches is after the only family she has left, and she'll do anything to keep them safe. She shouldn’t trust anyone. Especially not a mysterious—and sexy—man who shows up at her P.I. office looking for the silver wolf.Eli’s full of secrets he doesn’t know he keeps, and Farren’s going to figure them out. Because he’s more than just a case. He’s her mate. If Farren can’t protect him, her life is over. But can a broken woman find her strength before it’s too late? Or will she lose Eli forever?A Shift in the Earth is the third book in the Elemental Shifter series and ends on a cliffhanger. This dark, dangerous, and sexy series must be read in order.
author: Patricia D. Eddy
